mapper.select: SELECT b.bn_index,b.nick, b.subject, b.content, b.password , b.reg_date , c.name category FROM board_normal b INNER JOIN nboard_category c ON b.category = c.code where bn_index = #{bn_index}

SELECT b.bn_index , b.nick, b.subject, b.content, b.password , b.reg_date , c.name category FROM board_normal b INNER JOIN nboard_category c ON b.category = c.code WHERE bn_index>0 ORDER BY bn_index DESC , reg_date DESC;
